Resistance.help: Howler Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Wild_Charge.help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} begins a {PowerName} boosting their damage and movement speed.

Maiming_Bite.help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Train_Beasts.help: Your Howler Wolves have been trained, they can now use Maiming Bite.

Howl.help: The Wolf lets out a piercing Howl inspiring nearby beasts to greater acts of ferocity thus increasing their damage output briefly. Recharge: Very Slow
Howl.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} lets out an howl bolstering the damage of nearby beast allies!

Throat_Bite.help: The wolf charges its foe in an attempt to knock them off guard. Feral Charge causes high lethal damage, reduces defense and has a good chance to knock its target down. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Throat_Bite.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Tame_Beasts.help: Your Howler Wolves have been tamed, they can now use Howl and Throat Bite.
